transcript.text: this is part 2 of day 7 of the feast of
Sukkot and as you can see those are some
hot springs Yahweh said in his word
either be hot or cold and those Hot
Springs are definitely hot they feed
into some wooden barrels that you can
soak in so awesome a wonderful way to
spend Sukkot and it's a beautiful place
Hot Springs way up in the mountains
praise Yahshua for his creation happy
sukkot I tell you soaking in the hot
springs is one wonderful way to spend
